mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_TBL VALUES(SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{starRating}, #{movieNo}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewWriter}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_TBL SET REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, R_UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT, UPDATE_YN = 'Y' WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
UPDATE REVIEW_TBL SET R_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW_TBL WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND R_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R1.REVIEW_NO, R1.STAR_RATING, R1.MOVIE_NO, R1.REVIEW_CONTENT, R1.REVIEW_WRITER, R1.R_CREATE_DATE, R1.R_UPDATE_DATE, R1.UPDATE_YN, R1.R_STATUS, R2.LIKE_NO, R2.MEMBER_ID FROM REVIEW_TBL R1 LEFT JOIN REVIEW_LIKE_TBL R2 ON R1.MOVIE_NO = R2.MOVIE_NO AND R1.REVIEW_NO = R2.REVIEW_NO WHERE R1.MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND R1.R_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R1.REVIEW_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_LIKE_TBL WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
